articles.title: Sri Lanka T20 World Cup winner announces international retirement - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Sri Lanka batter Lahiru Thirimanne has called an end to his long career by announcing his retirement from international cricket with immediate effect.
articles.content: Sri Lanka batter Lahiru Thirimanne has called an end to his long career by announcing his retirement from international cricket with immediate effect.Thirimanne took to social media on Saturday to re… [+1727 chars]

articles.title: Happy birthday to the Spin Wiz and RCB Legend, Yuzvendra Chahal! - Royal Challengers Bangalore
articles.description: Happy birthday to the 𝑺𝒑𝒊𝒏 𝑾𝒊𝒛 and 𝑹𝑪𝑩 𝑳𝒆𝒈𝒆𝒏𝒅, Yuzvendra Chahal! 🏐✨We'll always love you, Yuzi! ❤️‍🔥#PlayBold #ನಮ್ಮRCB #HappyBirthdayYuzi
